Authors:
nozawa shunsuke, Kaoru Yamaguchi, Le Thi Hoang Yen, Duong
Van Hop, Nyunt Phay, Katsuhiko Ando, Kyoko Watanabe
Title:
New for species and sexual morph of genus
Pseudopestalotiopsis.
Keywords:
Pestalotioid fungi, Sexual morph, Asexual morph, New
species, Monograph
Abstract:
Pseudopestalotiopsis was comprised only 5 species, which
are Ps. cocos, Ps. indica, Ps. theae, and Ps. kunahensis. Surveying
Pseudopestalotiopsis in Vietnam in 2013 and in Myanmar in 2015, we found
19 stains including two novel Pseudopestalotiopsis species based on
morphological and phylogenetic analysis of ITS, Î²-tubulin and tef1 gene
regions. These are herein named as Ps. myanmarina and Ps. vietnumensis.
of 13 strains identified Ps. myanmarina , 7 strains produced sexual
morph which were resemble morphological characteristics to
Pestalosphaeria.
